House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00512
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM
SHORT TITLE : Philippine National Identification System Act
ABSTRACT : Provides an ID system for all citizens eighteen (18) years old and above, valid for five (5) years.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BARBERS, ROBERT ACE S.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
